subject: And I'M Saying Goodbye(To The City Of Sydney)
text:
And I’m saying goodbye, 
To the coast and sunlight;  
And I’m saying goodbye, 
to the Christmas ain’t not white. 

weeping my eyes, 
Gazing to the harbor sight; 
would you hold me tight, 
and be my darling tonight? 
Farewell! My mates of life, 
I’m waving with a sigh; 
Summer is at its height, 
Into the future we’ll fly~~
